Data: Toss Bangladesh win toss, will bat first - there are two changes for Australia. Andrew Tye and Mitchell Swepson are in, in place of Nathan Ellis and Adam Zampa.
Turner to Mohammad Naim, no run full outside off, from around the wickets. Defended away off the front foot
Turner to Mohammad Naim, no run round the wicket, outside off, tapped away
Turner to Mohammad Naim, 1 run full on the stumps, tucked into midwicket to get up and running
Turner to Soumya, no run on the stumps, nudged to the on side
Turner to Soumya, 1 run works a straight delivery into the gap at midwicket
Turner to Mohammad Naim, no run driven to mid-off...Turner skips through the first over without any damage
Hazlewood to Soumya, no run over the wicket, back of a length at the stumps, defended to cover
Hazlewood to Soumya, no run on off stump, back of a length, hit of seam movement and it's defended to the off side
Hazlewood to Soumya, 1 run fuller at off stump, he's caught on the crease, manages to nudge it square on the leg side
Hazlewood to Mohammad Naim, FOUR runs terrific shot...short outside leg stump, pulled off the hip through square leg. Excellent timing
Hazlewood to Mohammad Naim, FOUR runs good length outside off and that's a beautiful piece of timing as he angles it away through backward point with an open face
Hazlewood to Mohammad Naim, 1 run length ball and middle and off, runs off the face into the gully area
Turner to Mohammad Naim, 1 run round the wicket, worked off the stumps behind square
Turner to Soumya, SIX runs clears long-off! He's timed that chip-drive perfectly, although sure he quite meant to keep the fielder so interested
Turner to Soumya, 2 wide down the leg side and it evades Wade
Turner to Mohammad Naim, 1 run drives to the right of Turner who gets a hand on it with a dive but can't prevent the single
Turner to Soumya, no run nicely bowled, beats the outside edge as he stretches forward
Turner to Soumya, no run and he's done him again, a second one past the outside edge as Soumya looks to fiddle it away
Turner to Soumya, no run comes forward and pushes to point
Hazlewood to Mohammad Naim, (no ball) climbs from short of a length and beats the top edge as Naim chases it...but Hazlewood has overstepped
Hazlewood to Mohammad Naim, no run follows him with a back-of-a-length delivery, has a big heave to leg and it takes a top edge towards point
Hazlewood to Mohammad Naim, 1 run driven firmly to mid-on on the edge of the circle...think he's broken his bat
Hazlewood to Soumya, OUT short of a length, aims across the line to the leg side with a cross-batted swipe and gets a big top edge into the covers
Hazlewood to Mohammad Naim, 2 runs just clears the off-side ring, his bottom hand comes through the drive, the ball wasn't quite full enough, but the leading edge evades cover
Hazlewood to Mohammad Naim, no run a strangled appeal for lbw, this did him a little for pace, but it's angling down the leg side from round the wicket
Hazlewood to Mohammad Naim, no run pushed firmly back to the bowler
Agar to Shakib, no run over the wicket, full at the stumps, defended
Agar to Shakib, no run uses his feet and works this from outside off to midwicket
Agar to Shakib, 1 wide short of a length and this spins significantly, goes down the leg side and called wide
Agar to Shakib, no run punches this from outside off to the on side
Agar to Shakib, no run whipped firmly back to Agar who hurls the ball back to Wade and nearly catches Shakib napping
Agar to Shakib, no run big appeal for lbw! Agar liked it. Not given and they won't review...Shakib going for a sweep, taken on the knee roll. Height maybe the issue
Agar to Shakib, 2 runs hint of width outside off, square drives through backward point
Tye to Mohammad Naim, no run full at off stump, pushed back to the bowler
Tye to Mohammad Naim, no run full at the stumps, driven to cover
Tye to Mohammad Naim, 1 run short of a length around leg stump, worked off the pads into midwicket
Tye to Shakib, no run well bowled, a lovely slower delivery, beats a flat-foot drive as he shapes away very late on a full length
Tye to Shakib, no run full outside leg stump, deflects off the pad but Wade is able to get across
Tye to Shakib, no run drives and misses at a very full delivery outside off, doesn't reach Wade on the full. Good over from Tye
Turner to Mohammad Naim, 1 run driven through the off side to long-on
Turner to Shakib, 1 run worked off the pads to short fine leg
Turner to Mohammad Naim, 1 run chipped in the air into midwicket, lots of space there and Turner chases it himself
Turner to Shakib, 2 runs goes down early and sweeps from outside off to fine leg
Turner to Shakib, no run full at the stumps, Shakib plays back and taps to the on side
Turner to Shakib, 2 runs whipped off the pads and that's placed nicely between deep square and deep midwicket to allow the second
Agar to Mohammad Naim, 1 run pushed down the ground to long-on
Agar to Shakib, no run gets the yorker in, jabbed back down the pitch...that was flicked out of the fingers. Agar's doosra?
Agar to Shakib, no run driven into the covers
Agar to Shakib, no run full and straight, can only pushed it back to the bowler...Wade very vocal
Agar to Shakib, no run shorter outside off, he leans back and slices to short third man
Agar to Shakib, 1 run comes down the pitch and bunts to long-on
Swepson to Shakib, 1 run over the wicket, touch of width outside off, driven into the covers
Swepson to Mohammad Naim, 1 run on leg stump, worked off the pads to deep square leg
Swepson to Shakib, no run gives himself room outside leg, ball dies off the pitch and takes the bottom edge...dribbles back to the bowler
Swepson to Shakib, 2 runs stays deeper in the crease, tucks this off the pads through fine leg
Swepson to Shakib, no run a big-spinning googly outside off, he plays over the top of it
Swepson to Shakib, no run uses his feet, nearly done in the air, nicely bowled, doesn't get to the pitch but is able to push into the covers
Hazlewood to Mohammad Naim, no run round the wicket, good length at the stumps, punched to midwicket
Hazlewood to Mohammad Naim, 1 run angled into the pads, whipped to deep square leg
Hazlewood to Shakib, FOUR runs good invention from Shakib as he walks across the stumps and scoops a short-of-a-length delivery wide of the keeper to fine leg
Hazlewood to Shakib, no run this zips through! Shakib charged Hazlewood, it was short of a length and climbed over his bat and also kept following him
Hazlewood to Shakib, OUT and he gets him! Back of a length, a cutter, Shakib backing away to try and cut, he's cramped for room and gets a top edge
Hazlewood to Mahmudullah, no run full outside off, driven to cover
Swepson to Mohammad Naim, 2 runs good length on off, turning away. Cut in front of square to deep extra cover
Swepson to Mohammad Naim, no run overpitched just outside off, and drilled to cover
Swepson to Mohammad Naim, 1 run good length, on middle, and turning into him. Swiped to deep midwicket
Swepson to Mahmudullah, no run good length just outside off. Turning in. Tapped to the off side
Swepson to Mahmudullah, OUT lbw appeal, and given! Full, on off, and this is the wrong'un! Goes for the sweep, misses, hits the front leg. This is crashing into middle.
Swepson to Nurul, OUT out first ball? Maybe a bit high. Good length on off and turning in as Nurul goes onto the back foot to defend. Hits the front leg, huge lbw appeal but not given
Henriques to Mohammad Naim, no run good length on leg stump, tries to flick. Hits the pad, but inside edged and so he survives
Henriques to Mohammad Naim, 1 run good length, on off and punched to point for a quick single
Henriques to Afif, 2 runs short and wide, around the stumps, and he crunches the cut to deep Fielder in the deep cuts it off
Henriques to Afif, no run fullish, just outside off. Nudged to point but Naim is out of his crease so Agar has a shy at the bowler's end. Not a direct hit, but definitely forced Naim to scamper back
Henriques to Afif, 1 run good length angling into middle and leg. Worked off his hips to deep backward square leg
Henriques to Mohammad Naim, 1 run fullish, outside off stump. Pushed to mid off, where Hazlewood is standing
Swepson to Mohammad Naim, no run tidy ball. Good length on off and turning into middle. Goes deep in his crease and fends it back
Swepson to Mohammad Naim, 1 run overpitched, on his toes. Flicked to deep midwicket for one
Swepson to Afif, no run good length just outside off. Wants to cut, misses
Swepson to Afif, 2 runs length ball pulled to deep midwicket for a couple more
Swepson to Afif, no run full, googly on off. Left alone
Swepson to Afif, 1 leg bye
Agar to Afif, 2 runs full, just outside off. Nudged off his toes to deep midwicket
Agar to Afif, 2 runs good length, on off. Punched to midwicket, where there's a gap big enough to come back for two

Agar to Afif, 2 runs beautiful! Full on middle, down on one knee, and slog swept to cow corner. Christian at long on runs to his left, grabs with both hands as he dives across the line, and releases it with a reverse-flip into the field of play before falling over! Saves four very crucial runs
Agar to Afif, 1 run full, just outside off, and caressed to cover
Agar to Mohammad Naim, 1 run full on leg, and worked off his pads to deep backward square leg for a single
Agar to Afif, no run good length, on middle. Fended off the back foot
Swepson to Mohammad Naim, no run overpitched outside off, and clattered square to point, but intercepted

Swepson to Mohammad Naim, no run out? Maybe pitched outside leg. But they're reviewing anyway. This was a skiddy googly that pitched fullish around leg stump. Turned towards middle stump. Hit the front leg as he went back deep in his crease to flick. Pitching juuuuust outside leg so the umpire is right

Swepson to Mohammad Naim, OUT enough defending Naim feels. Goes for the slog sweep, but he ends up slicing the shot right up. Wade calls early for the catch, flicks his helmet off, and then takes the catch. This was full, quicker, on off, and Naim was a bit out of position to get that over cow corner
Swepson to Shamim Hossain, 1 run full outside off stump, and the drive is mistimed to mid off
Swepson to Afif, no run reverse paddle attempted as this full ball is played towards backward point
Swepson to Afif, 1 run full outside off, and driven to deep extra cover for one
Agar to Afif, SIX runs freebie! Loopy full toss, nearly waist high. Afif keeps his eyes on the ball and smashes it over deep backward squre for six.
Agar to Afif, 1 run good length, on off stump. Flicked to deep midwicket
Agar to Shamim Hossain, 1 run full, just outside off. Pushed past the bowler to long on for one

Agar to Afif, OUT full on off stump. Down on one knee as he goes for the slog sweep. Well timed, but it's soared straight into the hands of the fielder placed at deep midwicket for that very stroke. Afif will be disappointed falling that way. Wade gives out a chuckle as he high-fives Agar
Agar to Mahedi Hasan, no run good length, on off. Fended off the back foot
Agar to Mahedi Hasan, 1 run length ball outside off and turning away. Slapped to deep point
Turner to Mahedi Hasan, no run good length outside leg and skidding into middle. Mistimed flick to the leg side

Turner to Mahedi Hasan, 1 run full just outside leg. Tapped to midwicket and they scurry across for one. Fielder runs to his right, collects, and throws it in. Wade whips the bails off, but the dive has saved he batter
Turner to Shamim Hossain, no run fullish, just outside off stump. Tapped in front of point, and Henriques cuts it off
Turner to Shamim Hossain, 1 run good length, just outside off. Turning away, punchedf through the off side
Turner to Mahedi Hasan, 1 run full just outside off stump. Drilled to wide long on for one
Turner to Shamim Hossain, no run sweep missed as this full ball outside off turns away. Looks to go through the leg side. Ball whizzes under the bat
Tye to Mahedi Hasan, 1 run good length, outside off, and tapped to cover point
Tye to Shamim Hossain, OUT full, on leg, and it's the slower ball. Wants to work it leg side but pushes at it with hard hands. Pops straight to midwicket who gobbles it up with ease. Smart bowling
Tye to Nasum, no run yorker length, just outside off. Cutter going across. Can't get bat on ball
Tye to Nasum, 1 run fullish, on off. Tap and run to the off side
Tye to Mahedi Hasan, 1 run back of a length, just outside off. Slapped to third man for a quick single
Tye to Nasum, no run full just outside off, and the slower ball slides across the left-hander. Looks to hit it through the leg side but misses
Hazlewood to Mahedi Hasan, 2 runs good length, wider outside off. Slaps a cut to deep point. Can it dribble away for four? Nope, deep extra cover running to his left intercepts
Hazlewood to Mahedi Hasan, 1 run back of a length outside off. Comes down the wicket and flat-bats it to long on
Hazlewood to Nasum, 1 run full outside off. Backs away and then gets his bat to the ball by stretching out. Driven to cover
Hazlewood to Mahedi Hasan, no run fullish on off. Bit of extra bounce. Looks to play it to deep backward square. Misses
Hazlewood to Mahedi Hasan, 1 run good length, just outside off. Deft late cut that can beat short third man, but Henriques dives across, and parries it towards Wade
Hazlewood to Nasum, no run good length, just outside off. Slower ball to end the over as he looks to hammer it through the leg side but doesn't connect
Tye to Mahedi Hasan, 2 runs good length, just outside off. Walks across to paddle it leg side. Top edged and Hazlewood gets under it and puts in a dive, but he drops it

Tye to Mahedi Hasan, FOUR runs a much needed full toss. Slower ball, dipping just outside off. Swings leg side, gets enough on it to beat the two fielders on the leg side and take the side closer to 100
Tye to Mahedi Hasan, SIX runs three figures! Short ball, not quick. Stays on the back foot, keeps his eyes on the ball, and pulled over deep backward square leg for six
Tye to Mahedi Hasan, 2 runs full toss, maybe it's humid out there. Mistimed swiped to deep backward square
Tye to Mahedi Hasan, OUT full, just outside off. Clears the front leg to smack it over cover. Toe-ended, and in the air. Cover gets under it to take a reverse-cup catch

Tye to Shoriful Islam, OUT Tye finishes off wicket another wicket Good length on middle, and he goes for a wild heave through the leg side. Through the shot early, in the air, and deep midwicket takes the catch. Bangladesh finish on 104 for 9

As for standout players, Naim's 36-ball 28 doesn't look too bad given Bangladesh finished with only one wicket in hand. Afif's 17-ball 20 deserves a shout out too. Hazlewood excellent to get Soumya and Shakib out, and Swepson really got the ball to zip around.

7.35pm Lots of cutters, plenty of turn, and Bangladesh are restricted to 104 for 9. The Australians are smiling, the Bangladesh dugout looks disappointed with the effort, but you never know, maybe it was still a good choice to bat first on this deck. However, a target of 105 instead of (let's say) 125 makes a big difference in how Australia will approach the chase despite being down 0-3 in the series.
Hello everyone. Surely Australia can chase these? Mahedi Hasan to open the bowling
Mahedi Hasan to McDermott, 1 run works a straight delivery off the pads through midwicket
Mahedi Hasan to Wade, 2 runs round the wicket, good line outside off, draws Wade forward and takes an outside edge but it's reasonably well controlled wide of slip
Mahedi Hasan to Wade, no run full at off stump, defended
Mahedi Hasan to Christian, 2 runs big shot first ball! Full delivery outside off, he lofts it in the air over cover although without perfectly timing it
Mahedi Hasan to Christian, FOUR runs down the ground...well, DC's intentions are clean. A hefty swing through the line and it straight of mid-off
Shakib to McDermott, 1 run full on the pads, clipped through the on side
Shakib to Christian, 1 run full at the stumps, a slog sweep through midwicket...Christian isn't going to be defending
Shakib to McDermott, no run full at off stump, big stride forward and played to the on side
Shakib to McDermott, 2 runs more outside off, gives him a chance to drive through the off side, nicely placed wide of long-off
Shakib to McDermott, 1 wide pushed down the leg side
Shakib to McDermott, no run onto the front foot and pushes towards point
Shakib to McDermott, no run a straighter delivery, full at middle, defended back to the bowler
Nasum to Christian, no run skids through outside off and beats Christian's under edge as he cuts
Nasum to Christian, no run that's a slog! A huge swing across the line of a length delivery, good take by the keeper
Nasum to Christian, 1 run this one is clubbed into the midwicket area without much timing
Nasum to McDermott, no run short of a length, he rocks back and square drives to cover
Nasum to McDermott, no run good length at the stumps, stretches forward and defends
Nasum to McDermott, no run opens his stance a touch and drives this off the stumps to cover. Tight over
Shakib to Christian, SIX runs lovely footwork and super stroke...he skips down the pitch, holds his shape and lofts this over long-on. Classic
Shakib to Christian, SIX runs this is a bit more of a mow, but six more! Stayed in his crease this time and swung through the line over wide long-on
Shakib to Christian, SIX runs three in a row! Not quite so full, he went down on his back knee and slog swept over deep midwicket
Shakib to Christian, no run tossed wider outside off, Christian tries another slog sweep but this spins away and he can't connect
Shakib to Christian, SIX runs but he connects this time! More on the stumps, another meaty swing into the seats at long-on
Shakib to Christian, SIX runs shorter, flatter, but six more! 30 runs off the over. Five sixes. Christian rocked back and pulled this over deep midwicket
Nasum to McDermott, 1 run pushed towards mid-on
Nasum to Christian, 1 run driven along the ground to long-off
Nasum to McDermott, no run big spin! Back of a length at off spin and rags away from McDermott
Nasum to Marsh, no run another shout for lbw! But has an inside edge saved Marsh? Must have been. This looked straight. Yes, big edge
Nasum to Marsh, 2 runs edged, wide of the keeper, no slip! Nicely bowled, this turned again, Marsh playing away from his body
Mustafizur to Christian, no run and there's the cutter! Lovely stuff. Over the wicket, short of a length, grips and completely defeats Christian
Mustafizur to Henriques, no run another beauty! Length ball, angling across, grips off the surface and beats the edge
Mustafizur to Henriques, no run back of a length at off stump, defended
Mustafizur to Henriques, no run past the edge...full at off stump, Henriques' feet are caught in the crease and he's feeling for it. They are finding him almost unplayable
Mustafizur to Henriques, no run full and straight, defended to cover. A wicket maiden to end the Powerplay
Nasum to Marsh, 1 run sweeps a very full delivery off the stumps to short fine leg, tight run and a better return might have had Henriques in trouble
Nasum to Henriques, no run pushes a full delivery to mid-on
Nasum to Henriques, 1 run drives firmly down the ground to long-off
Nasum to Marsh, no run short of a length, angled in at the stumps, driven to cover
Nasum to Marsh, 1 run very full and driven down the ground
Nasum to Henriques, no run leans forward and plays back to the bowler
Shakib to Marsh, 1 run stays back on leg stump and drives a straight delivery to deep cover
Shakib to Henriques, 2 runs driven into the covers where the fielder dives over it
Shakib to Henriques, 1 run touch shorter, he plays back then drives down to long-off
Shakib to Marsh, FOUR runs great shot! A full delivery on the stumps, Marsh drives inside-out over extra cover
Shakib to Marsh, no run quicker, full at the stumps, played to cover
Mahedi Hasan to Carey, no run full on off from around the stumps. Defended to the leg side
Mahedi Hasan to Carey, no run full on middle and leg. Presses forward to drive, hard hands back to the bowler
Mahedi Hasan to Carey, no run good length, just outside off. Fended
Mahedi Hasan to Carey, no run good length, just outside off, fended
Mahedi Hasan to Carey, 1 run good length, outside off, cut to deep point
Mahedi Hasan to Marsh, 1 run full outside off, and the attempted drive is inside edged past the stumps to the leg side
Mustafizur to Marsh, no run full on middle, and nudged to the leg side off the front foot
Mustafizur to Marsh, 1 run good length, outside leg stump, and flicked to deep backward square for a single
Mustafizur to Turner, 1 run good length ball, outside leg stump. Flicked off his hips to fine leg for a single
Mustafizur to Marsh, no run full and wide. Angling away. Goes for the drive, and it goes past the edge to the keeper. Appeal for caught behind but the sound was bat hitting ground
Mustafizur to Marsh, no run full on leg and defended with soft hands
Mahedi Hasan to Turner, 1 run full just outside off. Goes across and swipes a sweep to square leg
Mahedi Hasan to Agar, no run around the stumps. Full on leg. Pushed back to the bowler
Mahedi Hasan to Agar, no run
Mahedi Hasan to Agar, no run full on middle. And defended back to the bowler's right
Mahedi Hasan to Agar, 1 run overpitched on leg stump. Clears the front leg, backs away, and drives to extra cover in the deep
Shoriful Islam to Agar, no run full, just outside off stump. Defended off the front foot to the off side
Shoriful Islam to Agar, 1 leg bye good length on off and angling into leg. Hits the thigh region, and rolls away. They scamper across for one
Shoriful Islam to Turner, no run slower ball. Full on middle. Fended back
Shoriful Islam to Turner, no run good length on middle and leg. Nudged off hips to midwicket
Shoriful Islam to Turner, 1 run full on off stump. Pushed to cover point for a quick run
Shoriful Islam to Agar, 1 run good length, wider outside off. Slapped to deep point
Mahedi Hasan to Agar, no run full on middle and leg. Defended onto his pads
Mahedi Hasan to Agar, 2 runs good length, outside off and turning away. Agar makes room, and slaps it to deep extra cover for a couple
Mahedi Hasan to Agar, 1 run full on middle, and driven to long off for a single
Mahedi Hasan to Turner, no run full, just outside off and turning in. Fended to the leg side
Mahedi Hasan to Turner, no run full outside off stump, and driven against the turn to cover
Mahedi Hasan to Turner, 1 run full outside off and driven past the fielder at cover to long off
Nasum to Turner, 1 run full, just outside off stump. Turning in. Takes the edge past first slip
Nasum to Agar, SIX runs full on off stump. Down on one knee and slapped over deep midwicket!
Nasum to Agar, 1 wide good length, outside leg stump. Turning in. Past the leg side to the keeper
Nasum to Agar, no run over the stumps. Full outside off stump. Driven back to the bowler
Nasum to Agar, 1 run good length, on off stump. Flicked off his waist to deep backward square leg
Nasum to Turner, no run full on middle stump. Defended back to the bowler
Nasum to Turner, no run good length, on off, and leg-side swipe to midwicket
Mahmudullah to Agar, 1 run full outside off stump. Turning away. Driven to cover
Mahmudullah to Turner, no run full, on off stump. Pushed to mid off off the front foot
Mahmudullah to Turner, 1 run good length outside off. Turning in. Stays on the back foot, and punched to long off
Mahmudullah to Agar, no run full outside off stump. Pushes at it away from his body. Sliced to point
Mahmudullah to Agar, 1 run fullish, wider outside off stump. Cut to deep point for a single
Mahmudullah to Turner, no run good length, just outside off. Tries to punch, but inside edged onto his pads
Shakib to Agar, FOUR runs overpitched, just outside off. Drilled past the non-striker and hit so well that it's beaten both long on and long off! Shakib proving to be expensive
Shakib to Agar, 1 run full on off, and turning in. Flicked to deep midwicket
Shakib to Turner, no run
Shakib to Turner, no run
Shakib to Turner, 1 run good length, just outside off. Fended to cover point and they go for a single
Shakib to Agar, 1 run overpitched, just outside off stump. Drilled to wide long off for one
Mustafizur to Agar, 2 runs low full toss on his pads, and flicked to deep midwicket. Played gently enough to come back for two
Mustafizur to Agar, no run full and wide, and wants to drive. Goes under the bat to the keeper
Mustafizur to Agar, no run cutter. Good length outside off, and zipping in to hit his gloves thereafter. Agar misses the cut, and takes his gloves off to tend to his hand
Mustafizur to Agar, no run another cutter. Length ball just outside off and jags in. Misses the cut, hits the bat and edged into his pad
Mustafizur to Agar, 1 run full outside off, and cut to point
Mustafizur to Turner, no run full and wide outside off stump. Happy to let that go to the keeper
Shoriful Islam to Agar, FOUR runs good length, outside off and clobbered by cutting through the off side in front of square! No stopping that
Shoriful Islam to Agar, no run slower ball, fuller outside off. Cut to point, and intercepted inside the circle
Shoriful Islam to Tye, no run yorker length, just outside off stump. Toe-ends a shot to midwicket
Shoriful Islam to Tye, 1 run back of a length, on middle. Pulled to the right of midwicket. But the fielder dives to stop a prospective four
Shoriful Islam to Turner, 1 run full just outside off. Mistimes a drive straight down the grounf. Long off cuts it off
Mustafizur to Turner, 1 run yorker length, just outside off. Slapped to point
Mustafizur to Tye, no run good length on middle. Nudged to point, and they look to take a single. But stopped
Mustafizur to Tye, 2 runs good length, outside leg stump. Flicked off his pads to deep backward square, but goes in the air to fine leg instead. Lands safely
Mustafizur to Tye, no run full just outside off. angling across. Misses the slog. Past the edge to the keeper
Mustafizur to Tye, no run yorker, just outside off. Cutter angles away. Under the bat to the keeper
Mustafizur to Tye, 1 run slower ball, full on leg. Tapped to the bowler's right and they are off for a single. Applause from the dug out as Australia win by three wickets

9.15pm A hard-earned win for Australia and Mahmudullah fist-pumps the Bangladesh bowlers too for the fight they showed defending such a low total. Dan Christian's match changing innings ensured Australia were always ahead of the chase. Agar's 27-ball 27 was crucial too on this surface.

That's all from us at ESPNcricinfo. On behalf of Ranjith P and Andrew McGlashan this is Sreshth Shah signing off. See you for the 5th T20I day after tomorrow. If you want more cricket, England v India is on!
Australia won by 3 wickets (with 6 balls remaining)
Player of the match is Mitchell Swepson, AUS
